entry.tran: 异乎寻常的;奇特的;怪异的
entry.def: Something that is freakish is remarkable because it is not normal or natural.

example.ex: ...his freakish voice varying from bass to soprano.
example.tran: 他游走在男低音部和女高音部之间的奇异嗓音

means.word_mean: 3. conspicuously or grossly unconventional or unusual;

sentences.sentence: "restaurants of bizarre design--one like a hat, another like a rabbit"
